article_title: 5 Megatrends With The Potential To Transform U.S. Health Care

article_metadata.author: Robert Pearl, M.D.

og.description: Cisco CEO John Chambers believes American health care has reached a tipping point. But which way will it tip? Dr. Robert Pearl explores five "megatrends" that could transform the U.S. health care system.
og.title: 5 Megatrends With The Potential To Transform U.S. Health Care
